title: Clear day, moderate-speed city driving with frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving on a busy city street with moderate speed and frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.3 m/s). There are 25 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with parked cars on the side. There are several other cars on the road, some of which are changing lanes. The traffic light is green, and there is a pedestrian crossing the street. The weather is clear, and there is no fog or rain.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed and frequently braking to avoid collisions with other vehicles on the road. The driver is being cautious and following traffic rules. The parked cars on the side of the road and the pedestrian crossing the street are also visible to the driver, who is taking necessary precautions to ensure safe driving.
